events.title: audio walk

events.description: an audio walk through the city with the entire family. all for free, bring your pets and snacks. all good. happy to see you, will be fun!

events.title: forest discovery

events.title: swimming
events.description: for the whole family

events.title: river cruise
events.description:
It consists of a boat tour in Lisbon lasting approximately 1 hour and 30 minutes, during which you can see the city's main monuments, such as the 25th of April Bridge, Praça do Comércio or the Tower of Belém, among many others, which are unmissable.

The boat trip Lisbon Portugal departs from the south and south-east river station in Praça do Comércio, the first monument you will see, which is a symbol of the city and where you will find the sculpture of Joseph I of Portugal and the Arco da Rua Augusta.

events.title: zebra camila, theater
events.description: camila zebra has lost her stripes. a terrible wind has stolen them and now she will do everything possible to get them back.

events.title: women´s day activities 8m
events.description: During this workshop, the little ones will learn what warrior women were like in Prehistory, who of course existed and were great fighters. A re-enactment of a funerary and magical rite will also take place.

events.title: terra mitica
events.description: Are you a fan of extreme sensations? At Terra Mitica you will find rides to excite you and make you shout like there's no tomorrow. If you like an adrenaline rush and you want unforgettable days, you just have to join us!!.

events.title: creative painting
events.short_description: "Creative Painting" is a place where you can develop your creativity as a family.
events.description:
Come with us and enjoy the experience of developing family creativity with this workshop. In this space we are going to create something magical from a blank sheet of paper.
The activity consists of learning different drawing techniques adapted to the little ones in the house. Later, we can enjoy the outdoors and painting with other families, creating a work of art with our own hands.

events.title: street theater
events.short_description: Discover the art of acting as a family.
events.description:
"Street Theater" is an activity developed by a group of young actors who want to promote theater to children, and what better way to do it than with a fun family activity. In this, in addition to fun and laughter, professional advice will be present to help you interpret your story.
There will be costumes provided by the team to get us into the role! Which family will have the hidden talent of acting?

events.title: vauxhall city farm
events.description: The perfect treat for someone who loves animals. Find out what it's like to be a farmer!

events.title: tea time
events.short_description: Learn about our ceramic workshops while we enjoy a family snack
events.description: The students of the CityCollege have organized this activity to enjoy as a family in which we can enjoy an afternoon of family fun. In this workshop, all family members will be able to paint a ceramic mug while we enjoy a pleasant snack with the other families. At the end of the activity each participant will be able to take their cup home!

events.title: dance with me!
events.short_description: Do you feel like spending an afternoon full of rhythm?
events.description: "Dance with Me" is an activity organized by the best dancers in Seville and surrounding areas, focused on spending an entertaining afternoon sharing laughter with the family and with the other members who participate in the workshop. Bring out the dancer inside you and discover the wide world of urban dance.

events.title: reuse and decorate
events.short_description: Create decorations for your home from recycled materials.
events.description: Reuse and Decorate is a workshop organized by Environmental Sciences students that aims to raise awareness among the little ones in the house about the importance of giving materials a second life. In this space we can create beautiful decorations for our home as a family that will always remind us of the good time we had, using defective or old materials from the university classrooms.

stories.story_text: We had an amazing day at the baking workshop. Our kids loved it and Esmeralda (the teacher) was such a wonderful person. Thank you so much!
Thank you very much for this great experience.
I would do this any time again, merci for everything! Btw there is an amazing coffee place just around the corner, check it out!
Slept like a baby horse. 100% Fantastic.
